meanings.definition: A red-brown oxidation product of adrenaline.
meanings.sent1: The adrenochrome was a red-brown color.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the adrenochrome in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The adrenochrome seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like adrenochrome rushing through her veins.
meanings.sent5: The adrenochrome gleamed under the microscope.

meanings.definition: A chemical compound produced by the oxidation of adrenaline.
meanings.sent1: They synthesized adrenochrome in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: The compound adrenochrome had unique properties.
meanings.sent3: The adrenochrome compound was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: His energy levels soared as if fueled by adrenochrome.
meanings.sent5: The smell of adrenochrome filled the room.
